name: Dino Walking Sim
description:
Take your pet dinosaur out for a walk, while also making sure it doesn't go Out Of Control.

My submission for the 48H GMTK Game Jam
Theme: Out Of Control

Credits:
Background art: @GuttyKreum - https://guttykreum.itch.io/field-of-green
Music: "8 Bit Summer!" Fun Upbeat Game Music by HeatleyBros
